title: Replicating Malicious Code (Virus or Worm)
overview: Replicating malicious code, including viruses and worms, will attempt to attack other systems once it has successfully compromised the target system or software.
remediation: ::PHASE:Operation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Antivirus software scans for viruses or worms.::PHASE:Installation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Always verify the integrity of the software that is being installed.::
